name: CaptureRequest

fields.name: accountId
fields.description: Account ID value. References an account record.

fields.name: amount
fields.description: Amount of currency that needs to be captured.

constructors.name: CaptureRequest
constructors.description: This method is used only for testing.

params.name: authorizationId
params.description: The amount to be debited or captured. Represents a payment authorization record.

description: Represents a Capture request. This class extends the BaseRequest class and inherits all its methods.
